text:
@TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump Meanwhile,  @realDonaldTrump ENDS FUNDING to 13 #COVID19 testing sites ON THE SAME DAY that the United States sets the record for MOST NEW CASES (35,000 people!) IN A SINGLE DAY! Dangerous Don Dingleberry protects statues, but not PEOPLE!
#ThursdayThoughts https://t.co/v2FnawEgCn
